oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CURRENT TRENDS IN APPLICATIONS OF MAGNETIC CERAMIC MATERIALS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BAHADUR, D
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: hexagonal ferrites
recording media
glass
crystallization
magnetic ceramic materials
their applications
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Magnetic oxides, a major constituent of magnetic ceramic materials, are most extensively used in a variety of applications as soft, moderate and hard ferrites. I review here its applications with special emphasis on some recent developments in magnetic recording materials.
